title: JAMES BEZEL 3MM, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE SILVER RIVIÈRE BRACELET
description:
NEW STONE SIZE: 3MM
Our most-worn bezel rivière bracelet in a new, daintier 3MM size. The James Bezel 3MM Rivière Bracelet features lab-grown white sapphires in a bezel setting that outlines each stone with a slim border of sterling silver.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: Bezel
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 3MM
